1.content:
Like any other day, I climbed the steep hill, that made me sweat through my thick jacket. When I thought about it, I would have to endure this for the two more years, at least.

By the time I got to the shoe locker, I felt exhausted, which was odd, as I wasn’t normally tired to this extent.

“Must be the heat.” I decided, walking grudgingly to homeroom.

What do you know, when I got to class, Haruhi wasn’t looking out the window, staring off into distance. She was too busy fanning herself with couple of notebooks. With her tongue sticking out, with sweat glistened on her forehead, I proceeded to greet her.

“Great morning, isn’t it?” I sarcastically asked.

“It’s too hot really!” she replied.

She missed the joke completely.

It being a Monday, her hair wasn’t done in pony tail, which probably didn’t help with the overwhelming heat.

“We should really get a fan in our club room.” I suggested.

“Kyon. That is an excellent idea!” Haruhi exclaimed just as Okabe-sensei entered.

The hot day went by as usually, until I felt a sharp pain in my stomach, in period 3, two periods before lunch.

“Sensei, may I be excused?” I asked politely, as I headed toward bathroom. When I got there, it was empty, as classes were still on. I sat in a stall but it didn’t help. Sitting there for 20 mins, I guessed that it was some kind of a false alarm, standing up and going out to the sink. Because it was so hot, I started to wash my face, before heading back to class...

Except... By the time I opened my eyes after washing my face, I found myself face to face with the sink top! Next thing I noticed was that my school uniform felt much heavier and baggier at the same time. And they were getting heavier. Before I knew it, I was completely trapped in the tent like clothes, which I fit into perfectly, only minutes ago. With a bit of digging, I managed to get out.

“Oh, why me!” I almost cried. “Is it you again, Haruhi! Did you want to meet a microscopic being?! Is that what this is about?!”

I realized that I had to quickly head to SOS Brigade room, to obtain some help from the time traveler, esper or the super AI. It took me over 10 minutes to get to the door of the bathroom. Fortunately for me, there was plenty of gap for me to slide under. When I managed to get out, I truly realized how insignificantly small I was. The hall corridor went on for thousands of miles and the ceiling was higher than any planes could go.

Lucky once again, SOS Brigade room was only three doors down the boy’s toilet. However, at my size, it was a trip of at least 5 km.

Not even halfway there, the thing I dreaded occurred in the back of my mind. The lunch bell rang, releasing a horde of student stampede onto my path. Fearing for my life, I turned around and faced the wall, sticking to it as close as I could. After about 5 minutes, walking died down a bit, and I looked around, to see only few students still about.

In another 10 minutes, I managed to get to the door of my rescue.

Usually, I knocked before I go in, but at this size, I doubted anyone would hear my knocking. So, I squeezed under the door, to see that...

11.content:
As I squeezed under the door, I came out, to be assaulted with smell of sweat and feet.

“Wow, that stinks. Where’s it coming from?” I asked myself, as I held my nose with my right hand. Looking around the gigantic surroundings, the only movement I saw was Haruhi sitting on her Commander chair, panting like a dog, with her shoes ditched to the side, with her feet hanging hundreds of feet above the ground

From my perspective, it was a sight to beheld as she stood so tall that she seemed like such a powerful sentient being, with me being a piece of dirt to such a magnificent creature.. Anyway, back on topic, I wondered whether Haruhi did really cause this whole mess, and also whether the world would end, if I showed myself to her.

With Haruhi, you always had to worry if she would scrap the current world and make a new one or not. However, I doubted that she would destroy the current one, just because she found her friend at size of a watermelon seed.

With this mindset, I decided to approach the giantess, who could be my only hope of being restored to normal size. Or, possibly the cause of it all. I quickly dashed under the table, to avoid being stepped on, if anyone came into the room. Slowly but surely, I was getting nearer to Haruhi, and the closer I did, the louder the panting and stronger the smell of feet seemed to me, overloading my senses.

“Where is everybody?” Haruhi boomed to noone in particular.

I wonder the same question myself, as I expected everyone to be here by now.

Few minutes pass and now I am right under her right foot, as she has her right leg crossed over the left. From there, I can see how dirty the white socks have been stained and also how they are slightly wet with Haruhi’s sweat. With it being so large and moving and blackish, it looked like a very large storm cloud. A wet one. As I further ventured on, I noticed that I can peek under Haruhi’s sailor skirt, revealing her plain white cotton panty.

This reminded me of the times when she used to get changed in front of the boys. Those were some good times. Now, she became conscious, and kicks me out of the club room every time, using violence. Knowing that, I hoped that she doesn’t look down right now, as it would be obvious that I am taking a scenic tour.

Soon, I make it to one of the leg of the chair that she’s sitting on, only to realize that it’s impossible for me to climb it as it has no footing and is merely a smooth metallic wall.

“What now?” I asked, rubbing my head with my hands, annoyed by how strong her feet smelt and how tired I felt.

As I try to come up with a plan to get in contact with this energetic giantess, Haruhi booms, “I’m so bored!”

Covering my ears in pain, I barely noticed her bringing her two feet down onto the ground. But, I felt it. Her feet shook the ground I stand on and made me fall on my ass.

“Are you ever not?” I shouted up at her, knowing that she can’t possibly hear my tiny voice. Well, I decided to head towards her feet, in the vein chance that I could climb all the way up to her ears. I decided to head for her left foot, which didn’t seem to be tapping away, unlike the other one. As I get nearer, the tapping really scared me as the smelly mansion sized foot moves at such an extreme speed.

When I get to the hill section of her left socked foot, I almost get knocked out by the sweaty stench. However, I can’t afford such time as the lunch bell rings loudly, leaving me no choice but to quickly grab onto it, using the thread as foothold. Right on cue, Haruhi stands up and proceeds to put on her shoes, so that she can go back to class without stinking up the whole classroom, like she did with the club room.

While the foot is moving so fast, could I manage to climb above the “event horizon*”?

Something definitely happened to him! Maybe an alien abduction! It is our duty as SOS Brigade to investigate this incident!”

11121.title: Mystery of Kyon's Disappearance

111211.content:
My eyes peeled open slightly, determined to see what was happening as my world shook. I was blessed by a blurry vision of a couple pairs of legs that rested under the table before the inconsiderate goddess crammed me back into her shoe.

"Everyone knows where they're going?" Haruhi boomed above, the last words I hear before the side of the shoe knocked me off the sock and onto the insole. I blacked out from a tremendous pressure.





"N..gato... ho.me..." My eyes slowly opened to garbled speech. I gazed down, my lower body crushed under Haruhi's dingy sock. How am I even alive? Perhaps there's some part of Haruhi that actually cares for me enough to make me more durable? She is a god after all.

I cringed as I felt Haru's sweat squeeze out onto me as she applied more pressure. I took a shocked breath as her foot lifted up slightly, forcing my entire body to slip under her crushing mass.
"N..no!" I yelled, a bad decision on my part as her sock made contact with my tongue. It was soaked, my mind reeled as my head was jammed between her toes. Heat radiated off the playful digits as they squeezed together, ready for the next step. Pressure on my chest built up as my unaware tormentor readied for another step.

I wish to blackout, yet it never happened. Why was it so easy to do before? There must be a reason, there must be...

My thoughts could no longer go on as the pressure released. My body tumbled awkwardly down to her heel, just in time for it to crash down. I couldn't help but yell out as the worst pressure I've ever encountered jammed me into Haruhi's used insole. I didn't black out, and nothing broke but my mind. I quickly recovered as the heel lifted off, letting me slide down to her arch which I grabbed onto for dear life. The foot lifted before slamming down, pressing the horrifying sock gently down onto me.

Having only the heat to deal with I could only think how Haruhi was simply heading home after a long day at school. I saw her wander home a thousand times, yet I never imagined it to effect me in such a way. In fact, I was glad when she went home, it gave me a small break back to the 'norm'.

Never had I imagined that I would be in her shoe, used as a second insole.

My grip faltered as her foot lifted, my body slipped under her toes for a few steps, before being grinded under her ball and heel. I prayed to black out, or be released.



Fifteen minutes seemed like an eternity as the unaware goddess entered her house. I don't know what I expected as her sock draped foot slid off of me, rolling me down the length of her foot before casually kicking her shoes out of the way. My eyes were slow to ajust to the blinding light that entered the shoe. The heat didn't make much effort to leave as I lay still, indented on Haruhi's battered insole. I slowly regained my composure, slowly realizing she could return at any point in time.

Finally ajusting to the light, I could finally see the peeling interior of the shoe. These shoes had seen better years, holes had started to form where the goddess curls her toes and grinds her ball. I slowly crawled towards the heel, shuddering in memory of Haruhi's weight crashing into my defenseless body. All hope drained from my face as I gazed at her ceiling. As frayed as the walls of her shoe was, there was no way I could climb the towering walls. There were too many smooth area's and each side curved slightly in, making it even harder to climb.

My mind reeled at the thought of supporting the hyperactive girl as an insole for the rest of my life. There must be some way out, there must be...
111211.title: Stuck

111212.content:
As I laid on the bottom of Haruhi's shoe, my eyes glued shut like a newborn puppy, I reflected on my current position. Even though I had "mysteriously disappeared" as Haruhi so quaintly put it, I was apparently still nothing more to the girl then a chance to deal with the supernatural! Talk about selfish! Then again this was the kind of behavior I had become accustomed to from Haruhi Suzumiya.

"Maybe his clothes have a clue!" Haruhi suddenly yelled out, getting to her feet. Not that I could see this or anything but from the sound of her voice she seemed to be getting ready to run.

"I'm going to go get them! Wait here everyone!"

And with that Haruhi was gone, racing off to the boy's bathroom. I sure hope no one's in there when she bursts in. In her haste Haruhi had kicked over her shoe. Thanks to my every increasing luck, it was the shoe I was in. Naturally I was sent flying from the smelly footwear and skidded across the tiles of the Brigade room floor, my skin chaffing. When I stopped rolling I rubbed my eyes hoping to get the sweat gone so I could at least see.

When my eyes were finally clear I looked up and saw I was at Nagato-san's feet. Her face was obscured by the thick hard cover book she was reading. Deciding she was my best bet at this moment I tried getting her attention. I shouted, I danced, I waved my arms, and did a number of embarrassing things I'd rather not think about.

"..."

She just sat there turning another page. I sighed and tried to think of another plan. Before I could, a god smiled on me. Thankfully it wasn't Haruhi. If you even believe in that stuff. Nagato was staring down at me. She closed her book and set it on the table. Koizumi and Asahina-san instantly looked over at her. Whenever Nagato put her book down it usually meant it was time to leave. I could hear the ever present smile in Koizumi's voice.

"I don't think Suzumiya-san would want us to leave so early Nagato-san."

"..."

Nagato kept her silence and merely picked me up. Before I knew what was happening the alien bookworm had me enclosed in her slender fingers. Her hands were as cold as her demeanor. With little ceremony she dropped me on the table. Hey, be careful! I'm a living thing you know!

Koizumi and Asahina-san were both staring down at me in shock. I quickly covered myself, my cheeks flushing red. I suppose I didn't really mind Asahina-san staring at me with her beautiful eyes but Koizumi was staring too! I wanted to punch that guy!

"W-what happened to Kyon-kun?"

Asahina-san's voice was like a soothing melody to me. She wouldn't allow me to be crushed into her sweaty shoe like used gum. Not like that demon in a school girl's uniform.

"It appears our Kyon-kun has shrank somehow."

Thanks for that Mr. Genius! What will your next brilliant deduction be?

"My, my, he's still as quick to anger as ever."

Koizumi's smile was starting to get on my nerves again. I turned to Asahina-san.

"Has anything like this ever happened in your time?"

"No, never. I'm sorry but, even if it had happened before the information would be classified. Forgive me!"

How could I ever refuse a request from her?

"Nagato-san, do you anything about Kyon-kun's predicament?"

"...No."

Blunt as ever. That's our Nagato.

"However with sufficient time I may be able to find a solution to his predicament."

A ray of hope at last! Maybe I wouldn't be stuck like this for too long.

"In order to find a sufficient solution I will need to converse with the Data Sentient Entity. That may take hours or years."

My heart was suddenly filled with darkness. Years? Was she serious? What am I saying, Nagato-san's always serious. I looked up and saw a look of dismay on everyone's (barring Nagato of course) faces. Koizumi was the first to recover. His smile was soon back in place, the bastard.

"I can also talk with the 'Organization' and see if they know of anything like this happening. In the meantime, I think it's best if we keep this a secret from Suzumiya-san."

"I agree."

"...Yes."

"Now that that's decided we have to discuss who will be taking care of Kyon-kun while Nagato-san and myself try and figure out what's going on."

What was I, a class pet? I wasn't about to passed around like a gerbil! Then again, if Asahina-san was the one taking care of me...oh, all the powers that be, please let her volunteer!

"I think it would be best if we take turns. That way Suzumiya-san won't find him as easily."

Damn that Koizumi and his ideas! Whatever, I suppose I could stand being taken care of by Nagato and that guy if it meant time with Asahina-san.

"B-but, who should get him first?"

Koizumi walked over to the bookshelf and grabbed the Go stone container. Shaking it up he put it in the center of the table.

"Now then, whoever draws a black Go stone gets him first. We'll keep drawing stones until only one of us has a black stone."

I watched them decide my fate by drawing board game pieces. After five draws, no one had singly drawn a black stone. Every time I saw Koizumi holding a black stone my heart jumped. They'd better hurry up before Haruhi got back.

Finally, it was over. It looked like I would be going with...

11121211.content:
Although the result wasn’t what I expected, it was better than being with that fool Koizumi.

“S...So, is Kyon-kun going to be remain under Nagato-san’s care?” Asahina, asked sweetly. I thought I saw a hint of disappointment, or maybe it was just my imagination.

“Yes he is, for tonight anyhow.” Koizumi pointed out.


“Maybe Suzumiya-san was becoming uninterested with the world again, and wanted one of us to mysteriously vanish... Because of that, the reality was distorted to allow Kyon-kun to do so, by simplying shrinking away from her sight.” Koizumi suggested.

“Quite probable.” Nagato added silently, studying me with her emotionless eyes. She can probably be programmed to see without those eyes on her, just like how her glasses were an accessory. Even if she was able to take off those eyes, she would be able to express just as much emotion as she does now, as her eyes do not serve in showing emotion, for Nagato.

“U-umm, Kyon-kun, is it cold for you?” Asahina-san asked, holding a tiny strip of tissue paper between her fingers. Oh, how compassionate you are, Asahina-san. You deserve no less than Novel Peace Prize! However, in the end, I refused, as I knew that I couldn’t possibly be cold for weeks to come, after having faced an ordeal of heat and sweat.

“And is that you, giving off that stink?” Koizumi added, with that foolish smile.

Are you catching some of those bluntness from Nagato? You just interrupted the gracious Asahina-san’s conversation with me! Excuse yourself and go get executed by Haruhi!

Then I realized, that I probably was giving off a bad stench, as I just spent half a day in Haruhi’s sweaty shoes. Sniffing myself, it brought me back the memories of the hell I endured, only tens of minutes ago. Why is it you always bring out the bad in me, you bastard?

“Would you at least like to wipe off the dry sweat, Kyon-kun?” Asahina-san asked once again, offering the same handkerchief, except now wet with tap water. I accepted the enormous blanket-sized tissue strip and wrapped myself around them. Being so wet and large, they felt like I was carrying those camera equipments all over again, up and down the school hill. However, it did feel good, as I managed to remove all dirt and sock lint that was stuck to me, thanks to Haruhi’s sweat.

After recounting my brave tale, they decided to hide me, as Haruhi would come back soon. Once again, I found myself on top of Nagato’s open palm, surrounded by her short but thin fingers. By the way, can someone guess what it feels like to be standing in the middle of a basketball field that is pulsating and soft but firm at the same time? Because that’s exactly how it feels, to be carried by Nagato. Oh, and there was a distinct scent of old books, which I found intoxicating.

As she carried me so easily like I weighed nothing, I had a rush of feeling of powerlessness. However I calmed myself down knowing that Nagato wasn’t power hungry unlike the evil dictator of the technically non-existent SOS Brigade. But then again, Nagato could have carried me easily, before I shrank to an inch tall anyway...

Soon, they deposited me in Nagato’s bag pocket, and I could hear Nagato chanting from the outside. It always brought me a chill whenever I heard her do that. Before long, the zippers of the pocket disappeared out of existence, and in turn, the small streams of light that came through disappeared, leaving me in the darkness.

I lied down to get comfortable, only to realize that I was falling asleep. But then, does anyone have the guts to blame me? I mean, I survived being under a skyscraper, with an ego to match!

A sudden thought came to my mind as my eyelids fell. Nagato wouldn’t have rigged the selection of the pieces in her favor, right?
11121211.title: Don't Forget to Feed Me, Nagato!

1112122.content:
Remember when I said a god was smiling down at me? Too late I realize that it must have been Haruhi after all. Either that or my luck was as rotten as an apple in winter. Koizumi was holding up a black stone while the sweet Asahina-san and expressionless Nagato each held a white stone. Asahina-san's face fell as she saw that she had lost. Nagato merely put her stone with the small pile she had already accumulated. Asahina-san smiled sadly at me.

"How will we decide who gets Kyon-kun second and third?"

"Whoever has the most black stones in their pile will get him second and the last person will get him third."

Koizumi, smile firmly in place, said.

I sat down with my head in my hands as Asahina-san and Nagato counted up their Go stones. How could this have happened? Why did Koizumi get to have me first? I never liked being around him too much when I was taller than him. Now that he's several times my size and naked to boot the last thing I wast is to be alone with him in his house! Come to think of it, had I ever seen his house?

"I-I have twelve black stones."

"...Eight."

It looked like I would be spending time in Heaven after I paid my debts in Hell. Before anything else could happen, Nagato grabbed her book and went back to reading as Haruhi slammed the door open my clothes bundled under one arm. I got a glimpse of her furious face before Koizumi, that presumptuous man, grabbed me and stuffed me in his jacket pocket. I sank into utter darkness as I fell into the bottom of the pocket. At least he kept his uniform clean. There wasn't a speck of dirt anywhere to be felt. My eyes were useless in this darkness but I could still hear Haruhi raving like a lunatic.

"Those damn teachers! Why are they always getting in my way? What kind of stupid rule is it that a girl can't even go into the boy's bathroom!"

Obviously privacy and conventions meant nothing to Haruhi.

"I still managed to snag Kyon's clothes! Let's take a look at them!"

I heard my uniform being sprawled out on the table along with the clatter of Go stones. Asahina-san must be scooping them back into their container. Nagato would still be reading and Koizumi would no doubt be helping Haruhi search my clothes. Wait a minute, I don't want either of those two touching my underwear! This isn't fair!

Since the situation was totally and completely out of my hands there wasn't much I could do except lay out in the bottom of the pocket and wait. In this hot weather the pocket heated up quickly and I was sweating in no time. Unfortunately I had nothing to fan myself with and there was absolutely nothing in Koizumi's pockets, not even a ten yen coin! Even that would have been better than nothing.

They had been searching through my clothes for the better part of half an hour before I heard Nagato's book close.

"Oh well, I guess there's nothing here. Still, I'm taking these clothes with me! There's a chance Kyon might get beamed back down with stories about aliens!"

One...track...mind...

The sounds of clean up filled the air, with Nagato silently exiting the room, Asahina-san changing back into her school uniform as Haruhi raved about my sudden "experience" and Koizumi quietly made his escape. I felt myself swaying slightly with Koizumi's movements, his heartbeat a constant sound behind me. He was walking at a leisurely pace, as if he had tiny living humans in his pocket all the time.

"I'm not going to take you out until I get to my house."

His voice drifted quietly down to me. I sure hope no one was around to hear him talking to himself. Then again, who really cares what people think about him.

"It shouldn't take too long to get to my home. Once we're there I'll find something for you to wear."

Great, I wonder what he'd manage to scrounge up. It's like people kept clothes for inch tall humans. Not even dolls had clothes that small. I lost track of time as I sat in the darkness of Koizumi's breast pocket, my body continuing to heat up. Finally, as I was about to pass out from the heat, I saw Koizumi's hand descending down towards me like a god's from above. His grip was gentle and I was slowly deposited onto his desk. So this was Koizumi's room. It was surprisingly normal. That made sense I suppose since Koizumi is just an average student until he enters a Sealed Reality. I looked up and saw him staring down at me with his cat's grin. I quickly covered myself.

"Can you just get me those clothes you promised?"

Koizumi giggled like a creep and headed toward the door.

"Don't move from that spot until I get back Kyon-kun. I wouldn't want you getting lost."

Whatever, I don't need someone like you treating me like a little kid.

Koizumi left the door open as he went to fetch my new clothes. I sighed and sat down. Not even as a kid had I ever felt this fragile. It was weird. I didn't like feeling so helpless. Even when I was with Haruhi at normal size I never felt this vulnerable even though she could destroy reality if she wanted too. How many situations have I gotten into since I met Haruhi? I don't have the time or the skill to count them all. If somebody out there has time, could you please count them up for me?

11122.content:
I wake to see that I’m still in darkness. Despite that, I notice that the smell has changed slightly. Before I blacked out, all I could smell was sweat but now, there’s a hint of another musty scent that I can’t pin down. Feeling the surface, I can tell that I am still near her sweaty sock. Listening carefully, I manage to hear the shower water running. Putting one and one together, I quickly come to the conclusion that I have ended up in Haruhi’s laundry basket, trapped in her sock, and surrounded by her used underwear that give off strong feminine scent. Even so, the odour coming off the sock is too strong, and I also realized that I smell like her feet as well!


Oh crap. I sure hope she doesn’t have a dryer at home, otherwise she would be able to wash her clothes at this supposedly late hour. And that wouldn’t be too good at my size. Without being able to see, I tried to stretch the sock and create enough gap for me to get out. However, it seemed impossible as I’m no where near strong enough, and all I am rewarded is Haruhi’s fresh sweat on my palm.

Come on, think of something Kyon. That’s it! I will bite my way through this sock! I should be able to still tear the sock at a microscopic level and nibble my way out!

Such simple tactic.

Or not. As I took a bite, I couldn’t help but to pull the horrible stuff away from my mouth and yell out profanities. It tasted like vinegar mixed with sand! It probably was! Maybe it’s easier drowning in the washing machine?

I can’t stop now! If I die, who’s going to keep Haruhi in check, making sure she doesn’t destroy the whole world? What a tough role I have. Next thought that pops up in my mind is whether it’s possible to bite off my tongue, without dying. That would be so convenient right about now. While I’m having these philosophical thoughts, I hear the water go off, meaning that Haruhi has finished her shower.

With increased urgency, I close my eyes and clench my teeth over the same place that I took the first taste in. As I bite hard into it and pull, I can practically feel the Haruhi’s sweat being squeezed out and fall onto my accursed tongue. Ignoring the searing pain, I keep at it, and with almost no noise, the sock rips enough for my fist to get through.

But with that small gap, I easily enlarged it enough for me to slip through. As I jump out the sweaty hole, light streams into my eyes, blinding me.
